name: Hellhole Game WebGL
description:
If you choose to play this game I would be very grateful if you could complete the survey linked below:

https://forms.gle/LnaVNfy6zENDKn4v5

Hellhole is an isometric physics puzzle game.

The game was designed and developed as part of a study into ludonarrative dissonance within computer games.

You can find a downloadable Windows version of Hellhole here:

Hellhole Windows Version

HellholeGame_WebGL_V105 published 3rd April 2021

(Some Windows UI elements stripped to prevent viewport crashes)
